channel.title: Njpc talk
channel.description: how do i make so when player uses object such as portal A npc says something like in the chat window down the bottom and where do i put it? in the code. so when playuer clicks portal obid[7288] a npc[608 says somethig???

item.title: Njpc talk
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

chnage the 356 to yor portal id
if(objectID == 356) {
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 100;

                            }

You Can Work Out Where To Add This
should be under this
/NPC Talking/
well it is in my client
case 100:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126("Hello Go Though That Portal4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 4886);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
